data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Bolu to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bolu, Turkey
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Bolu, Turkey to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Bolu, Turkey to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Bolu, Turkey.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Abaza people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 2,674 neighbors who are far from you in Bolu. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Bolu.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Bolu.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.
